name: H3R0KU-D3PL0Y3R-4-FR34KY
description: With this you can deploy repository that are bl-a-c-k-listed by H3R0KU

OTHER_INSTALLS.description: If you need install packages for running your app, fill with space in between each package

REPO_URL.description: Enter the repository link that you want to deploy

REPO_BRANCH.description: Enter the repository branch name if not default HEAD

PREPARATION_CMD.description: If you need to run any bash commands before running the bot, specify here

BOT_START_CMD.description: Full command which starts your bot, either python command or bash command [use -m if you need to run __main__.py from a folder]
